About Me

I am an innovative engineering graduate with internship experience in Electrical and
Electronic Fields. Focusing on developing skills on industrial embedded systems
and application of relevant, intend to build a career with leading corporate environment
for long term with committed. Having a strong knowledge in Power Electronics,
Digital System Design, Controls Systems and Computer Systems.

Skills

  • Operating Systems - Linux, Windows, Android
  • CAD Tools - AutoCAD Electrical, Eagle CAD, Easy EDA, Proteus, PLECS, Xilinx ISE
  • Programming - Bash, Python, Embedded C++, Matlab, Verilog, LATEX, HTML/CSS
  • Machine Learning/Data Analysis - OpenCV, Numpy, Matplotlib, Tensorflow, Keras
  • Microcontrollers and Firmware - Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Atmega 328P PIC
  • Other Tools - Google Colab, VS code, AnyDesk, RealVNC, G-Suite, Microsoft Office

Interests

Apart from EEE, I am passionate towards opensource softwares and linux systems. In fact I loved to work with linux environment. I have serious concern towards the privacy. I use tails and whonix. I developed my interests towards computer systems from childhood. Still I remember playing flash games (especially Dave and toons) games on my Pentium III,
windows 98 PC. I have unique taste in world cinema. Chris. Nolan & David Fincher are
my top fav directors.
